runtime_hooks._comment: Enable runtime execution hooks to capture actual node execution data. This provides more accurate metadata but adds ~0.2% overhead. Requires ComfyUI restart to take effect. Alternative: Set environment variable AAA_METADATA_ENABLE_HOOKS=true
runtime_hooks._comment_disagreements: Log when parser and runtime hooks provide different values for the same field. Useful for debugging conditional logic and switch nodes.
runtime_hooks._comment_performance: Log performance metrics for hook overhead. Shows timing data for each hook execution when debug.enabled is also true.
runtime_hooks._comment_inline_limit: Maximum size in KB for inline runtime data before moving to sidecar file. Default 32KB. Increase if you want more runtime data embedded directly in images.

debug._comment: Enable detailed debug logging for troubleshooting

metadata._comment: Cache model/LoRA hash calculations for performance (~1000x faster on subsequent runs)
